eu.tivian.musico.database

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.database.DatabaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class DatabaseAdapter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A helper class which minimizes the direct communication with the database, to prevent corruption of data.
    See Also:
    SQLite documentation

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DatabaseAdapter.Sort
      Available sorting options for listing all albums.

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        private static DatabaseAdapter instance
        Singleton instance of this class.

      • db

        private final SQLiteDatabase db
        A SQLite database.

      • lastOrderBy

        private String lastOrderBy
        Stores last used ORDER BY clause for listing all of the albums.

      • ordering

        private boolean ordering
        Determines whether descending or ascending ordering will be used.
        true value means descending ordering, while false value means ascending ordering

      • ratesUpdated

        private SimpleStatement ratesUpdated
        Compiled SQL statement used to refresh the currency rates.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static DatabaseAdapter init(Context context)
        Initializes the singleton in thread-safe manner.
        Parameters:
        context - to use for locating paths to the the database.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance.

      • get

        public static DatabaseAdapter get()
        Gets the singleton instance.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance.

      • getIdOrInsert

        private long getIdOrInsert(String table,
                           String column,
                           String value)
        Inserts the value into the table at the specified column if it doesn't already exists in the database and returns the row BaseColumns._ID. If the value is already present then it only returns the appropriate BaseColumns._ID value.
        Parameters:
        table - target table.
        column - target column.
        value - a value which we're looking for, or are inserting if it's not present in the database.
        Returns:
        the BaseColumns._ID value.

      • add

        public void add(Album album)
        Adds the album into the database.
        Parameters:
        album - album to be added into the database.

      • update

        public boolean update(Album album)
        Updates the database based on the Album.id value.
        Parameters:
        album - album to be updated.
        Returns:
        true if the update was successful.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(Album album)
        Deletes the album from the database based on the Album.id value.
        Parameters:
        album - album to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if the deletion was successful.

      • setSetting

        public void setSetting(String key,
                       String value)
        Sets the value into the settings table at the supplied key.
        Parameters:
        key - settings key.
        value - value to be added or change (whether the key is present).

      • getSetting

        public String getSetting(String key)
        Returns the value of the chosen setting.
        Parameters:
        key - the chosen setting.
        Returns:
        value corresponding to the key in the settings table.

      • getCursor

        public AlbumCursor getCursor()
        Default cursor for listing all albums. Default ordering is first title of the album, then the year of the release.
        Returns:
        the cursor with list of the albums.

      • getCursor

        public AlbumCursor getCursor(String... orderBy)
        Gets the cursor with list of all the albums.
        Parameters:
        orderBy - determines the ordering of the list.
        Returns:
        the cursor with list of the albums.

      • getCursor

        public AlbumCursor getCursor(boolean useLastOrdering,
                             String... orderBy)
        Gets the cursor with list of all the albums.
        Parameters:
        useLastOrdering - true if you want the ordering to be the same, but the results will be flipped.
        orderBy - determines the ordering of the list.
        Returns:
        the cursor with list of the albums.

      • updateRates

        public void updateRates()
        Updates the currency rates. Can only be called once a day. Any other calls will be ignored.

      • query

        Cursor query(String sql,
             String... params)
        Gets cursor from raw SQL query.
        Parameters:
        sql - the SQL query. The SQL string must not be ; terminated
        params - you may include ?s in where clause in the query, which will be replaced by the values from params. The values will be bound as Strings.
        Returns:
        the cursor, which is positioned before the first entry.

      • getDb

        SQLiteDatabase getDb()
        Returns the underlying SQLite database.
        Returns:
        the database object.

      • getTracks

        private Cursor getTracks(long id)
        Gets the list of tracks for chosen Album.id.
        Parameters:
        id - album ID.
        Returns:
        the cursor with track list for chosen album.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the database.
